item.title: But why?
item.description: “Que diable allait-il faire dans cette galère - Les fourberies de Scapin (Acte II, scène 7)" Why this blog? This blog is intended to summarize the information and knowledge I collected around my tech journey on the Internets. It’s an idea around for long time now but I make it real now because I have some free time ahead. I will try hard to keep publish regularly over time. The intent of these posts is to follow the following addage:
